name: Tarragona 3: Devil's Bridge
summary: The Devil's Bridge is inspired in the Tarragona's roman aqueduct. The legend tells that a shepherd requested to the Devil to build a bridge between two mountains, this will make his live easier because he will save time moving the sheeps. The Devil built it in one night! The next morning the Devil request the price to the shepherd: the soul of the first who cross the bridge! But he told him to take the correct soul. He was not the first one to cross it! The first one was a sheep.
